alert.note: Alert for Marble and Glen Canyons (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 1:53PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...Strong winds from a thunderstorm will impact Page and Lake Powell in northern Coconino County through 315 PM MDT/215 PM MST/... At 250 PM MDT/150 PM MST/, Doppler radar was tracking a thunderstorm just south of Wahweap, or near Page, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds will generate hazardous boating conditions on Lake Powell . Locations impacted include... Page, Wahweap and Lake Powell. This includes the following highways... State Route 98 between mile markers 548 and 549. U.S. Highway 89 between mile markers 547 and 555. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors or on Lake Powell, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
